title: Chapter XII - TEMPORARY RELEASE, RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT FACILITY DAY REPORTING CENTER, AND COMPREHENSIVE ALCOHOL AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE TREATMENT CENTER
content:
Chapter XII - TEMPORARY RELEASE, RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT FACILITY DAY REPORTING CENTER, AND COMPREHENSIVE ALCOHOL AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE TREATMENT CENTER
State Regulations

Subchapter A - TEMPORARY RELEASE PROGRAMS (Part 1900 to 1920)

Subchapter B - RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT FACILITY DAY REPORTING CENTER PROGRAM (Part 1925 to 1927)

Subchapter C - Comprehensive Alcohol And Substance Abuse Treatment Program (Part 1950 to 2000)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
